Package cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Server
  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The Server class defines a server, either a human server or a self-checkout server.

    • Field Detail

      • customerQueue

        private final java.util.Queue<Customer> customerQueue
        Servers have (1) A queue of waiting customers (2) A maximum size of queue; (3) An unique id; (4) A RandomGenerator that determines server's servicing and resting behaviors. (5) A double value denoting probability of resting. (6) A customer it is currently serving. (7) Static fields of: [1]. Total server number. [2]. Default serving duration.

      • Server

        private Server​(int maxQLen,
               cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator rng,
               double Pr,
               java.util.Queue<Customer> customerQueue)
        Constructs a server with an RandomGenerator with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        maxQLen - The maximum length of the waiting queue.
        rng - The RandomGenerator that determines the servicing and resting behaviors.
        Pr - The probability of resting.
        customerQueue - The queue of waiting customers of the server.

      • createHumanServer

        public static Server createHumanServer​(int maxQLen,
                                       cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator rng,
                                       double Pr)
        Create a human server with given maximum queue length, RandomGenerator, and resting probability.
        Parameters:
        maxQLen - The given maximum queue length.
        rng - The given RandomGenerator.
        Pr - The given resting probability.
        Returns:
        A human server.

      • createSelfCheckout

        public static Server createSelfCheckout​(int maxSharedQLen,
                                        cs2030.simulator.RandomGenerator rng,
                                        java.util.Queue<Customer> sharedQueue)
        Create a self-checkout server with given RandomGenerator and shared queue.
        Parameters:
        maxSharedQLen - The maximum length of the shared queue of all self-sheckout servers.
        rng - The given RandomGenerator.
        sharedQueue - The shared queue of all self-sheckout servers.
        Returns:
        A self-checkout server.

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • toggleRest

        Toggle the resting state of the server, and returns the calling server wrapped in an Optional.
        Returns:
        This server wrapped as a Optional.

      • getBackTime

        public double getBackTime​(double time)
        Returns the back time of the resting server based on the given startig time of resting.
        Parameters:
        time - The starting time of resting.
        Returns:
        The given starting time plus a random resting period.
